titleStmt.title: To the reader. To my faythfull brethren, we geue thankes to God for your constancie and upryght delynge in this gret controuersie now raysyd by packynge of enemys about the wearinge of popish apparell ...

notesStmt.note: The copy catalogued is bound with STC 10389 and STC 10390.
Reproduction of the original in the Yale University. Library.
